name: Criptonous Grounds: Lark Forest
description:
Story:

A man driving home from work late at midnight suddenly breaks his car's engine. Now stranded in the middle of a forest he is faced with monsters trying to kill him.

Controls:

Double Left Click -Interact

W -Up movement for "You"

A -Left movement for "You"

S -Down movement for "You"

D -Right movement for "You"

Goals:

Survive until 4:00 AM.

Dodge "Me" in the phone.

Double click Eyes to prevent jumpscare.

Sound Credits:

Heartbeat #9, Scary (creepy ambience) and Smooth Rain (ambience) by:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzS3MussouizmCUMNF01YIQ

Flashlight Button Sound Effect by:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCok6P4rwxBMun9ghaIV4ufQ

Breath sound effect by:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRJHD3Yhv2qJ4wLam4BDhUw
